api_list.name: Get individual news source News
api_list.description: Get news about Bitcoin and Ethereum a specific new resorce
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptonews-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/cryptonew"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptonews-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptonews-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newinfoid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptonews-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Crypto News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news  about Bitcoin and Ethereum.
